sentences.en: Agassi made short work of his opponent.
sentences.cn: 阿加西干净利落地击败了对手。

sentences.en: Graf’s opponent in today’s final will be Sukova.
sentences.cn: 格拉芙今天的决赛对手将是苏科娃。

sentences.en: He avowed himself an opponent of all alliances.
sentences.cn: 他声称他是所有联盟的反对者。

sentences.en: He became an outspoken opponent of the old Soviet system.
sentences.cn: 他成为旧的苏联体制直言不讳的抨击者。

sentences.en: He felled his opponent with a single blow.
sentences.cn: 他一拳击倒了对手。

sentences.en: He is admired even by his political opponents.
sentences.cn: 他甚至受到政敌的钦佩。

sentences.en: He made several cheap jibes at his opponent during the interview.
sentences.cn: 在采访中他好几次对他的对手粗俗地加以嘲讽。

sentences.en: He was a vociferous opponent of Conservatism.
sentences.cn: 他高声反对保守主义。

sentences.en: He was magnanimous in defeat and praised his opponent's skill.
sentences.cn: 他对失败表现得很洒脱，并且赞扬了对手的才能。

sentences.en: He's the best opponent I've come across this season, a great player.
sentences.cn: 他是我本赛季遇到的最出色的对手，一位了不起的运动员。

sentences.en: His height gives him an inbuilt advantage over his opponent.
sentences.cn: 他的身高成为他相对于对手的先天优势。

sentences.en: His opponent swamped him with facts and figures.
sentences.cn: 他的对手抛出精确的资料和数据，使他难以招架。

sentences.en: In debate he was a formidable opponent.
sentences.cn: 在辩论中他是位难应付的对手。

sentences.en: Norris twice knocked down his opponent in the early rounds of the fight.
sentences.cn: 诺里斯在拳击赛的头几个回合中，曾两度击倒他的对手。

sentences.en: Not since 1988 had she whitewashed an opponent in her opening match.
sentences.cn: 自1988年以来她还从未在开场赛中让对手吃过鸭蛋。

sentences.en: Rodgers was not an opponent of the new airport.
sentences.cn: 罗杰斯并不反对建设新机场。

sentences.en: She bowled out her opponent.
sentences.cn: 她打败了她的对手。

sentences.en: The boxer gave his opponent a punch on the nose.
sentences.cn: 这个拳击手朝他对手的鼻子上猛击一拳.

sentences.en: The president put the blame squarely on his opponent.
sentences.cn: 总统将责任完全归咎于对手。

sentences.en: The soldier jabbed at his opponent.
sentences.cn: 那个战士猛击他的对手。

sentences.en: The worst thing you can do is underestimate an opponent.
sentences.cn: 最严重的错误就是低估对手。

sentences.en: There were indirect references to his opponent.
sentences.cn: 隐晦提到了他的反对者。

trans.tran_en: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument
